car_1.question: How many continents are there?
car_1.query: SELECT count(*) FROM CONTINENTS;

car_1.question: What is the number of continents?
car_1.query: SELECT count(*) FROM CONTINENTS;

car_1.question: How many countries does each continent have? List the continent id, continent name and the number of countries.
car_1.query: SELECT T1.ContId ,  T1.Continent ,  count(*) FROM CONTINENTS AS T1 JOIN COUNTRIES AS T2 ON T1.ContId  =  T2.Continent GROUP BY T1.ContId;

car_1.question: For each continent, list its id, name, and how many countries it has?
car_1.query: SELECT T1.ContId ,  T1.Continent ,  count(*) FROM CONTINENTS AS T1 JOIN COUNTRIES AS T2 ON T1.ContId  =  T2.Continent GROUP BY T1.ContId;

car_1.question: How many countries are listed?
car_1.query: SELECT count(*) FROM COUNTRIES;

car_1.question: How many countries exist?
car_1.query: SELECT count(*) FROM COUNTRIES;

car_1.question: How many models does each car maker produce? List maker full name, id and the number.
car_1.query: SELECT T1.FullName ,  T1.Id ,  count(*) FROM CAR_MAKERS AS T1 JOIN MODEL_LIST AS T2 ON T1.Id  =  T2.Maker GROUP BY T1.Id;

car_1.question: What is the full name of each car maker, along with its id and how many models it produces?
car_1.query: SELECT T1.FullName ,  T1.Id ,  count(*) FROM CAR_MAKERS AS T1 JOIN MODEL_LIST AS T2 ON T1.Id  =  T2.Maker GROUP BY T1.Id;

car_1.question: Which model of the car has the minimum horsepower?
car_1.query: SELECT T1.Model FROM CAR_NAMES AS T1 JOIN CARS_DATA AS T2 ON T1.MakeId  =  T2.Id ORDER BY T2.horsepower ASC LIMIT 1;

car_1.question: What is the model of the car with the smallest amount of horsepower?
car_1.query: SELECT T1.Model FROM CAR_NAMES AS T1 JOIN CARS_DATA AS T2 ON T1.MakeId  =  T2.Id ORDER BY T2.horsepower ASC LIMIT 1;

car_1.question: Find the model of the car whose weight is below the average weight.
car_1.query: SELECT T1.model FROM CAR_NAMES AS T1 JOIN CARS_DATA AS T2 ON T1.MakeId  =  T2.Id WHERE T2.Weight  <  (SELECT avg(Weight) FROM CARS_DATA)

car_1.question: What is the model for the car with a weight smaller than the average?
car_1.query: SELECT T1.model FROM CAR_NAMES AS T1 JOIN CARS_DATA AS T2 ON T1.MakeId  =  T2.Id WHERE T2.Weight  <  (SELECT avg(Weight) FROM CARS_DATA)

car_1.question: Find the name of the makers that produced some cars in the year of 1970?
car_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.Maker FROM CAR_MAKERS AS T1 JOIN MODEL_LIST AS T2 ON T1.Id  =  T2.Maker JOIN CAR_NAMES AS T3 ON T2.model  =  T3.model JOIN CARS_DATA AS T4 ON T3.MakeId  =  T4.id WHERE T4.year  =  '1970';

car_1.question: What is the name of the different car makers who produced a car in 1970?
car_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.Maker FROM CAR_MAKERS AS T1 JOIN MODEL_LIST AS T2 ON T1.Id  =  T2.Maker JOIN CAR_NAMES AS T3 ON T2.model  =  T3.model JOIN CARS_DATA AS T4 ON T3.MakeId  =  T4.id WHERE T4.year  =  '1970';

car_1.question: Find the make and production time of the cars that were produced in the earliest year?
car_1.query: SELECT T2.Make ,  T1.Year FROM CARS_DATA AS T1 JOIN CAR_NAMES AS T2 ON T1.Id  =  T2.MakeId WHERE T1.Year  =  (SELECT min(YEAR) FROM CARS_DATA);

car_1.question: What is the maker of the carr produced in the earliest year and what year was it?
car_1.query: SELECT T2.Make ,  T1.Year FROM CARS_DATA AS T1 JOIN CAR_NAMES AS T2 ON T1.Id  =  T2.MakeId WHERE T1.Year  =  (SELECT min(YEAR) FROM CARS_DATA);

car_1.question: Which distinct car models are the produced after 1980?
car_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.model FROM MODEL_LIST AS T1 JOIN CAR_NAMES AS T2 ON T1.model  =  T2.model JOIN CARS_DATA AS T3 ON T2.MakeId  =  T3.id WHERE T3.year  >  1980;

car_1.question: What are the different models for the cards produced after 1980?
car_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.model FROM MODEL_LIST AS T1 JOIN CAR_NAMES AS T2 ON T1.model  =  T2.model JOIN CARS_DATA AS T3 ON T2.MakeId  =  T3.id WHERE T3.year  >  1980;

car_1.question: How many car makers are there in each continents? List the continent name and the count.
car_1.query: SELECT T1.Continent ,  count(*) FROM CONTINENTS AS T1 JOIN COUNTRIES AS T2 ON T1.ContId  =  T2.continent JOIN car_makers AS T3 ON T2.CountryId  =  T3.Country GROUP BY T1.Continent;

car_1.question: What is the name of each continent and how many car makers are there in each one?
car_1.query: SELECT T1.Continent ,  count(*) FROM CONTINENTS AS T1 JOIN COUNTRIES AS T2 ON T1.ContId  =  T2.continent JOIN car_makers AS T3 ON T2.CountryId  =  T3.Country GROUP BY T1.Continent;

car_1.question: Which of the countries has the most car makers? List the country name.
car_1.query: SELECT T2.CountryName FROM CAR_MAKERS AS T1 JOIN COUNTRIES AS T2 ON T1.Country  =  T2.CountryId GROUP BY T1.Country ORDER BY Count(*) DESC LIMIT 1;

car_1.question: What is the name of the country with the most car makers?

car_1.question: Which distinctive models are produced by maker with the full name General Motors or weighing more than 3500?

car_1.question: What are the different models created by either the car maker General Motors or weighed more than 3500?

car_1.question: Among the cars with more than lowest horsepower, which ones do not have more than 3 cylinders? List the car makeid and make name.
car_1.query: SELECT T2.MakeId ,  T2.Make FROM CARS_DATA AS T1 JOIN CAR_NAMES AS T2 ON T1.Id  =  T2.MakeId WHERE T1.Horsepower  >  (SELECT min(Horsepower) FROM CARS_DATA) AND T1.Cylinders  <=  3;

car_1.question: Which are the car makers which produce at least 2 models and more than 3 car makes? List the id and the maker.
car_1.query: SELECT T1.Id ,  T1.Maker FROM CAR_MAKERS AS T1 JOIN MODEL_LIST AS T2 ON T1.Id  =  T2.Maker GROUP BY T1.Id HAVING count(*)  >=  2 INTERSECT SELECT T1.Id ,  T1.Maker FROM CAR_MAKERS AS T1 JOIN MODEL_LIST AS T2 ON T1.Id  =  T2.Maker JOIN CAR_NAMES AS T3 ON T2.model  =  T3.model GROUP BY T1.Id HAVING count(*)  >  3;

car_1.question: What are the id and names of the countries which have more than 3 car makers or produce the 'fiat' model?
car_1.query: SELECT T1.countryId ,  T1.CountryName FROM Countries AS T1 JOIN CAR_MAKERS AS T2 ON T1.CountryId  =  T2.Country GROUP BY T1.countryId HAVING count(*)  >  3 UNION SELECT T1.countryId ,  T1.CountryName FROM Countries AS T1 JOIN CAR_MAKERS AS T2 ON T1.CountryId  =  T2.Country JOIN MODEL_LIST AS T3 ON T2.Id  =  T3.Maker WHERE T3.Model  =  'fiat';

car_1.question: What are the ids and names of all countries that either have more than 3 car makers or produce fiats?
car_1.query: SELECT T1.countryId ,  T1.CountryName FROM Countries AS T1 JOIN CAR_MAKERS AS T2 ON T1.CountryId  =  T2.Country GROUP BY T1.countryId HAVING count(*)  >  3 UNION SELECT T1.countryId ,  T1.CountryName FROM Countries AS T1 JOIN CAR_MAKERS AS T2 ON T1.CountryId  =  T2.Country JOIN MODEL_LIST AS T3 ON T2.Id  =  T3.Maker WHERE T3.Model  =  'fiat';

flight_2.question: Count the number of United Airlines flights that arrive in Aberdeen.
flight_2.query: SELECT count(*) FROM FLIGHTS AS T1 JOIN AIRPORTS AS T2 ON T1.DestAirport  =  T2.AirportCode JOIN AIRLINES AS T3 ON T3.uid  =  T1.Airline WHERE T2.City  =  "Aberdeen" AND T3.Airline  =  "United Airlines"

flight_2.question: Which city has most number of arriving flights?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.City FROM AIRPORTS AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.AirportCode  =  T2.DestAirport GROUP BY T1.City ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

flight_2.question: Which city has the most frequent destination airport?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.City FROM AIRPORTS AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.AirportCode  =  T2.DestAirport GROUP BY T1.City ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

flight_2.question: Which city has most number of departing flights?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.City FROM AIRPORTS AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.AirportCode  =  T2.SourceAirport GROUP BY T1.City ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

flight_2.question: Which city is the most frequent source airport?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.City FROM AIRPORTS AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.AirportCode  =  T2.SourceAirport GROUP BY T1.City ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

flight_2.question: What is the code of airport that has the highest number of flights?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.AirportCode FROM AIRPORTS AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.AirportCode  =  T2.DestAirport OR T1.AirportCode  =  T2.SourceAirport GROUP BY T1.AirportCode ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

flight_2.question: What is the airport code of the airport with the most flights?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.AirportCode FROM AIRPORTS AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.AirportCode  =  T2.DestAirport OR T1.AirportCode  =  T2.SourceAirport GROUP BY T1.AirportCode ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

flight_2.question: What is the code of airport that has fewest number of flights?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.AirportCode FROM AIRPORTS AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.AirportCode  =  T2.DestAirport OR T1.AirportCode  =  T2.SourceAirport GROUP BY T1.AirportCode ORDER BY count(*) LIMIT 1

flight_2.question: Give the code of the airport with the least flights.
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.AirportCode FROM AIRPORTS AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.AirportCode  =  T2.DestAirport OR T1.AirportCode  =  T2.SourceAirport GROUP BY T1.AirportCode ORDER BY count(*) LIMIT 1

flight_2.question: Which airline has most number of flights?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline GROUP BY T1.Airline ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

flight_2.question: What airline serves the most flights?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline GROUP BY T1.Airline ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

flight_2.question: Find the abbreviation and country of the airline that has fewest number of flights?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Abbreviation ,  T1.Country FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline GROUP BY T1.Airline ORDER BY count(*) LIMIT 1

flight_2.question: What is the abbreviation of the airilne has the fewest flights and what country is it in?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Abbreviation ,  T1.Country FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline GROUP BY T1.Airline ORDER BY count(*) LIMIT 1

flight_2.question: What are airlines that have some flight departing from airport 'AHD'?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline WHERE T2.SourceAirport  =  "AHD"

flight_2.question: Which airlines have a flight with source airport AHD?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline WHERE T2.SourceAirport  =  "AHD"

flight_2.question: What are airlines that have flights arriving at airport 'AHD'?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline WHERE T2.DestAirport  =  "AHD"

flight_2.question: Which airlines have a flight with destination airport AHD?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline WHERE T2.DestAirport  =  "AHD"

flight_2.question: Find all airlines that have flights from both airports 'APG' and 'CVO'.
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline WHERE T2.SourceAirport  =  "APG" INTERSECT SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline WHERE T2.SourceAirport  =  "CVO"

flight_2.question: Which airlines have departing flights from both APG and CVO airports?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline WHERE T2.SourceAirport  =  "APG" INTERSECT SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline WHERE T2.SourceAirport  =  "CVO"

flight_2.question: Find all airlines that have flights from airport 'CVO' but not from 'APG'.
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline WHERE T2.SourceAirport  =  "CVO" EXCEPT SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline WHERE T2.SourceAirport  =  "APG"

flight_2.question: Which airlines have departures from CVO but not from APG airports?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline WHERE T2.SourceAirport  =  "CVO" EXCEPT SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline WHERE T2.SourceAirport  =  "APG"

flight_2.question: Find all airlines that have at least 10 flights.
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline GROUP BY T1.Airline HAVING count(*)  >  10

flight_2.question: Which airlines have at least 10 flights?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline GROUP BY T1.Airline HAVING count(*)  >  10

flight_2.question: Find all airlines that have fewer than 200 flights.
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline GROUP BY T1.Airline HAVING count(*)  <  200

flight_2.question: Which airlines have less than 200 flights?
flight_2.query: SELECT T1.Airline FROM AIRLINES AS T1 JOIN FLIGHTS AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.Airline GROUP BY T1.Airline HAVING count(*)  <  200

flight_2.question: Give the flight numbers of flights leaving from Aberdeen.

flight_2.question: Find the number of flights landing in the city of Aberdeen or Abilene.
flight_2.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Flights AS T1 JOIN Airports AS T2 ON T1.DestAirport  =  T2.AirportCode WHERE T2.city  =  "Aberdeen" OR T2.city  =  "Abilene"

flight_2.question: How many flights land in Aberdeen or Abilene?
flight_2.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Flights AS T1 JOIN Airports AS T2 ON T1.DestAirport  =  T2.AirportCode WHERE T2.city  =  "Aberdeen" OR T2.city  =  "Abilene"

flight_2.question: Find the name of airports which do not have any flight in and out.
flight_2.query: SELECT AirportName FROM Airports WHERE AirportCode NOT IN (SELECT SourceAirport FROM Flights UNION SELECT DestAirport FROM Flights)

cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.question: What are the names of documents that use templates with the code BK?
cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.query: SELECT T2.document_name FROM Templates AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.template_id  =  T2.template_id WHERE T1.template_type_code  =  "BK"

cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.question: Show all template type codes and the number of documents using each type.
cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.query: SELECT T1.template_type_code ,  count(*) FROM Templates AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.template_id  =  T2.template_id GROUP BY T1.template_type_code

cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.question: What are the different template type codes, and how many documents use each type?
cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.query: SELECT T1.template_type_code ,  count(*) FROM Templates AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.template_id  =  T2.template_id GROUP BY T1.template_type_code

cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.question: Which template type code is used by most number of documents?
cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.query: SELECT T1.template_type_code FROM Templates AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.template_id  =  T2.template_id GROUP BY T1.template_type_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.question: Return the code of the template type that is most commonly used in documents.
cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.query: SELECT T1.template_type_code FROM Templates AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.template_id  =  T2.template_id GROUP BY T1.template_type_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.question: Show all template type codes that are not used by any document.
cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.query: SELECT template_type_code FROM Templates EXCEPT SELECT template_type_code FROM Templates AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.template_id  =  T2.template_id

cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.question: What are the codes of template types that are not used for any document?
cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.query: SELECT template_type_code FROM Templates EXCEPT SELECT template_type_code FROM Templates AS T1 JOIN Documents AS T2 ON T1.template_id  =  T2.template_id

cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.question: What is the template type code for template type description "Book".

cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.question: Return the type code of the template type with the description "Book".
cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.query: SELECT template_type_code FROM Ref_template_types WHERE template_type_description  =  "Book"

cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.question: What are the distinct template type descriptions for the templates ever used by any document?
cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.template_type_description FROM Ref_template_types AS T1 JOIN Templates AS T2 ON T1.template_type_code  = T2.template_type_code JOIN Documents AS T3 ON T2.Template_ID  =  T3.template_ID

cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.question: Return the different descriptions for templates that have been used in a document.

cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.question: Return the ids corresponding to templates with the description 'Presentation'.
cre_Doc_Template_Mgt.query: SELECT T2.template_id FROM Ref_template_types AS T1 JOIN Templates AS T2 ON T1.template_type_code  = T2.template_type_code WHERE T1.template_type_description  =  "Presentation"

course_teach.question: Show names of teachers and the courses they are arranged to teach.
course_teach.query: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Course FROM course_arrange AS T1 JOIN course AS T2 ON T1.Course_ID  =  T2.Course_ID JOIN teacher AS T3 ON T1.Teacher_ID  =  T3.Teacher_ID

course_teach.question: What is the name of each teacher and what course they teach?
course_teach.query: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Course FROM course_arrange AS T1 JOIN course AS T2 ON T1.Course_ID  =  T2.Course_ID JOIN teacher AS T3 ON T1.Teacher_ID  =  T3.Teacher_ID

course_teach.question: Show names of teachers and the courses they are arranged to teach in ascending alphabetical order of the teacher's name.
course_teach.query: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Course FROM course_arrange AS T1 JOIN course AS T2 ON T1.Course_ID  =  T2.Course_ID JOIN teacher AS T3 ON T1.Teacher_ID  =  T3.Teacher_ID ORDER BY T3.Name

course_teach.question: What are the names of the teachers and the courses they teach in ascending alphabetical order by the name of the teacher?
course_teach.query: SELECT T3.Name ,  T2.Course FROM course_arrange AS T1 JOIN course AS T2 ON T1.Course_ID  =  T2.Course_ID JOIN teacher AS T3 ON T1.Teacher_ID  =  T3.Teacher_ID ORDER BY T3.Name

course_teach.question: Show the name of the teacher for the math course.
course_teach.query: SELECT T3.Name FROM course_arrange AS T1 JOIN course AS T2 ON T1.Course_ID  =  T2.Course_ID JOIN teacher AS T3 ON T1.Teacher_ID  =  T3.Teacher_ID WHERE T2.Course  =  "Math"

course_teach.question: What are the names of the people who teach math courses?
course_teach.query: SELECT T3.Name FROM course_arrange AS T1 JOIN course AS T2 ON T1.Course_ID  =  T2.Course_ID JOIN teacher AS T3 ON T1.Teacher_ID  =  T3.Teacher_ID WHERE T2.Course  =  "Math"

course_teach.question: Show names of teachers and the number of courses they teach.
course_teach.query: SELECT T2.Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM course_arrange AS T1 JOIN teacher AS T2 ON T1.Teacher_ID  =  T2.Teacher_ID GROUP BY T2.Name

course_teach.question: What are the names of the teachers and how many courses do they teach?
course_teach.query: SELECT T2.Name ,  COUNT(*) FROM course_arrange AS T1 JOIN teacher AS T2 ON T1.Teacher_ID  =  T2.Teacher_ID GROUP BY T2.Name

course_teach.question: Show names of teachers that teach at least two courses.
course_teach.query: SELECT T2.Name FROM course_arrange AS T1 JOIN teacher AS T2 ON T1.Teacher_ID  =  T2.Teacher_ID GROUP BY T2.Name HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2

course_teach.question: What are the names of the teachers who teach at least two courses?
course_teach.query: SELECT T2.Name FROM course_arrange AS T1 JOIN teacher AS T2 ON T1.Teacher_ID  =  T2.Teacher_ID GROUP BY T2.Name HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  2

course_teach.question: List the names of teachers who have not been arranged to teach courses.
course_teach.query: SELECT Name FROM teacher WHERE Teacher_id NOT IN (SELECT Teacher_id FROM course_arrange)

course_teach.question: What are the names of the teachers whose courses have not been arranged?

museum_visit.question: How many visitors below age 30 are there?
museum_visit.query: SELECT count(*) FROM visitor WHERE age  <  30

museum_visit.question: Find the names of the visitors whose membership level is higher than 4, and order the results by the level from high to low.
museum_visit.query: SELECT name FROM visitor WHERE Level_of_membership  >  4 ORDER BY Level_of_membership DESC

museum_visit.question: What is the average age of the visitors whose membership level is not higher than 4?
museum_visit.query: SELECT avg(age) FROM visitor WHERE Level_of_membership  <=  4

museum_visit.question: Find the name and membership level of the visitors whose membership level is higher than 4, and sort by their age from old to young.
museum_visit.query: SELECT name ,  Level_of_membership FROM visitor WHERE Level_of_membership  >  4 ORDER BY age DESC

museum_visit.question: Find the id and name of the museum that has the most staff members?
museum_visit.query: SELECT museum_id ,  name FROM museum ORDER BY num_of_staff DESC LIMIT 1

museum_visit.question: Find the average number of staff working for the museums that were open before 2009.
museum_visit.query: SELECT avg(num_of_staff) FROM museum WHERE open_year  <  2009

museum_visit.question: What are the opening year and staff number of the museum named Plaza Museum?
museum_visit.query: SELECT Num_of_Staff ,  Open_Year FROM museum WHERE name  =  'Plaza Museum'

museum_visit.question: find the names of museums which have more staff than the minimum staff number of all museums opened after 2010.
museum_visit.query: SELECT name FROM museum WHERE num_of_staff  >  (SELECT min(num_of_staff) FROM museum WHERE open_year  >  2010)

museum_visit.question: find the id, name and age for visitors who visited some museums more than once.
museum_visit.query: SELECT t1.id ,  t1.name ,  t1.age FROM visitor AS t1 JOIN visit AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.visitor_id GROUP BY t1.id HAVING count(*)  >  1

museum_visit.question: What are the id, name and membership level of visitors who have spent the largest amount of money in total in all museum tickets?
museum_visit.query: SELECT t2.visitor_id ,  t1.name ,  t1.Level_of_membership FROM visitor AS t1 JOIN visit AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.visitor_id GROUP BY t2.visitor_id ORDER BY sum(t2.Total_spent) DESC LIMIT 1

museum_visit.question: What are the id and name of the museum visited most times?
museum_visit.query: SELECT t2.Museum_ID ,  t1.name FROM museum AS t1 JOIN visit AS t2 ON t1.Museum_ID  =  t2.Museum_ID GROUP BY t2.Museum_ID ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

museum_visit.question: What is the name of the museum that had no visitor yet?
museum_visit.query: SELECT name FROM museum WHERE Museum_ID NOT IN (SELECT museum_id FROM visit)

museum_visit.question: Find the name and age of the visitor who bought the most tickets at once.
museum_visit.query: SELECT t1.name ,  t1.age FROM visitor AS t1 JOIN visit AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.visitor_id ORDER BY t2.num_of_ticket DESC LIMIT 1

museum_visit.question: What are the average and maximum number of tickets bought in all visits?
What is the total ticket expense of the visitors whose membership level is 1?
museum_visit.query: SELECT sum(t2.Total_spent) FROM visitor AS t1 JOIN visit AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.visitor_id WHERE t1.Level_of_membership  =  1

museum_visit.question: What is the name of the visitor who visited both a museum opened before 2009 and a museum opened after 2011?
museum_visit.query: SELECT t1.name FROM visitor AS t1 JOIN visit AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.visitor_id JOIN museum AS t3 ON t3.Museum_ID  =  t2.Museum_ID WHERE t3.open_year  <  2009 INTERSECT SELECT t1.name FROM visitor AS t1 JOIN visit AS t2 ON t1.id  =  t2.visitor_id JOIN museum AS t3 ON t3.Museum_ID  =  t2.Museum_ID WHERE t3.open_year  >  2011

museum_visit.question: Find the number of visitors who did not visit any museum opened after 2010.
museum_visit.query: SELECT count(*) FROM visitor WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT t2.visitor_id FROM museum AS t1 JOIN visit AS t2 ON t1.Museum_ID  =  t2.Museum_ID WHERE t1.open_year  >  2010)

museum_visit.question: How many museums were opened after 2013 or before 2008?
museum_visit.query: SELECT count(*) FROM museum WHERE open_year  >  2013 OR open_year  <  2008

battle_death.question: How many ships ended up being 'Captured'?
battle_death.query: SELECT count(*) FROM ship WHERE disposition_of_ship  =  'Captured'

battle_death.question: List the name and tonnage ordered by in descending alphaetical order for the names.
battle_death.query: SELECT name ,  tonnage FROM ship ORDER BY name DESC

battle_death.question: List the name, date and result of each battle.
What is maximum and minimum death toll caused each time?
What is the average number of injuries caused each time?
What are the death and injury situations caused by the ship with tonnage 't'?
battle_death.query: SELECT T1.killed ,  T1.injured FROM death AS T1 JOIN ship AS t2 ON T1.caused_by_ship_id  =  T2.id WHERE T2.tonnage  =  't'

battle_death.question: What are the name and results of the battles when the bulgarian commander is not 'Boril'
battle_death.query: SELECT name ,  RESULT FROM battle WHERE bulgarian_commander != 'Boril'

battle_death.question: What are the different ids and names of the battles that lost any 'Brig' type shipes?
battle_death.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM battle AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.lost_in_battle WHERE T2.ship_type  =  'Brig'

battle_death.question: What are the ids and names of the battles that led to more than 10 people killed in total.
battle_death.query: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM battle AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.lost_in_battle JOIN death AS T3 ON T2.id  =  T3.caused_by_ship_id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING sum(T3.killed)  >  10

battle_death.question: What is the ship id and name that caused most total injuries?
battle_death.query: SELECT T2.id ,  T2.name FROM death AS T1 JOIN ship AS t2 ON T1.caused_by_ship_id  =  T2.id GROUP BY T2.id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

battle_death.question: What are the distinct battle names which are between bulgarian commander 'Kaloyan' and latin commander 'Baldwin I'?
battle_death.query: SELECT name FROM battle WHERE bulgarian_commander  =  'Kaloyan' AND latin_commander  =  'Baldwin I'

battle_death.question: How many different results are there for the battles?
How many battles did not lose any ship with tonnage '225'?
battle_death.query: SELECT count(*) FROM battle WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT lost_in_battle FROM ship WHERE tonnage  =  '225' );

battle_death.question: List the name and date the battle that has lost the ship named 'Lettice' and the ship named 'HMS Atalanta'
battle_death.query: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.date FROM battle AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.lost_in_battle WHERE T2.name  =  'Lettice' INTERSECT SELECT T1.name ,  T1.date FROM battle AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.lost_in_battle WHERE T2.name  =  'HMS Atalanta'

battle_death.question: Show names, results and bulgarian commanders of the battles with no ships lost in the 'English Channel'.
battle_death.query: SELECT name ,  RESULT ,  bulgarian_commander FROM battle EXCEPT SELECT T1.name ,  T1.result ,  T1.bulgarian_commander FROM battle AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.lost_in_battle WHERE T2.location  =  'English Channel'

battle_death.question: What are the notes of the death events which has substring 'East'?
battle_death.query: SELECT note FROM death WHERE note LIKE '%East%'

student_transcripts_tracking.query: SELECT T2.transcript_date ,  T1.transcript_id FROM Transcript_Contents AS T1 JOIN Transcripts AS T2 ON T1.transcript_id  =  T2.transcript_id GROUP BY T1.transcript_id ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1

student_transcripts_tracking.question: What is the date and id of the transcript with the least number of results?
student_transcripts_tracking.query: SELECT T2.transcript_date ,  T1.transcript_id FROM Transcript_Contents AS T1 JOIN Transcripts AS T2 ON T1.transcript_id  =  T2.transcript_id GROUP BY T1.transcript_id ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1

student_transcripts_tracking.question: Find the semester when both Master students and Bachelor students got enrolled in.
student_transcripts_tracking.query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.semester_id FROM Degree_Programs AS T1 JOIN Student_Enrolment AS T2 ON T1.degree_program_id  =  T2.degree_program_id WHERE degree_summary_name  =  'Master' INTERSECT SELECT DISTINCT T2.semester_id FROM Degree_Programs AS T1 JOIN Student_Enrolment AS T2 ON T1.degree_program_id  =  T2.degree_program_id WHERE degree_summary_name  =  'Bachelor'

student_transcripts_tracking.question: What is the id of the semester that had both Masters and Bachelors students enrolled?
student_transcripts_tracking.query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.semester_id FROM Degree_Programs AS T1 JOIN Student_Enrolment AS T2 ON T1.degree_program_id  =  T2.degree_program_id WHERE degree_summary_name  =  'Master' INTERSECT SELECT DISTINCT T2.semester_id FROM Degree_Programs AS T1 JOIN Student_Enrolment AS T2 ON T1.degree_program_id  =  T2.degree_program_id WHERE degree_summary_name  =  'Bachelor'

student_transcripts_tracking.question: Find the first name of the students who permanently live in the country Haiti or have the cell phone number 09700166582.

voter_1.question: List the contestant numbers and names, ordered by contestant name descending.
voter_1.query: SELECT contestant_number ,  contestant_name FROM contestants ORDER BY contestant_name DESC

voter_1.question: What are the maximum and minimum values of area codes?
What is last date created of votes from the state 'CA'?
voter_1.query: SELECT max(created) FROM votes WHERE state  =  'CA'

voter_1.question: What are the names of the contestants whose names are not 'Jessie Alloway'
voter_1.query: SELECT contestant_name FROM contestants WHERE contestant_name != 'Jessie Alloway'

voter_1.question: What are the distinct states and create time of all votes?
voter_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT state ,  created FROM votes

voter_1.question: What are the contestant numbers and names of the contestants who had at least two votes?
voter_1.query: SELECT T1.contestant_number , T1.contestant_name FROM contestants AS T1 JOIN votes AS T2 ON T1.contestant_number  =  T2.contestant_number GROUP BY T1.contestant_number HAVING count(*)  >=  2

voter_1.question: Of all the contestants who got voted, what is the contestant number and name of the contestant who got least votes?
voter_1.query: SELECT T1.contestant_number , T1.contestant_name FROM contestants AS T1 JOIN votes AS T2 ON T1.contestant_number  =  T2.contestant_number GROUP BY T1.contestant_number ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1

voter_1.question: What are the number of votes from state 'NY' or 'CA'?
voter_1.query: SELECT count(*) FROM votes WHERE state  =  'NY' OR state  =  'CA'

voter_1.question: How many contestants did not get voted?
voter_1.query: SELECT count(*) FROM contestants WHERE contestant_number NOT IN ( SELECT contestant_number FROM votes )

voter_1.question: What is the area code in which the most voters voted?
voter_1.query: SELECT T1.area_code FROM area_code_state AS T1 JOIN votes AS T2 ON T1.state  =  T2.state GROUP BY T1.area_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

voter_1.question: What are the create dates, states, and phone numbers of the votes that were for the contestant named 'Tabatha Gehling'?
voter_1.query: SELECT T2.created ,  T2.state ,  T2.phone_number FROM contestants AS T1 JOIN votes AS T2 ON T1.contestant_number  =  T2.contestant_number WHERE T1.contestant_name  =  'Tabatha Gehling'

voter_1.question: List the area codes in which voters voted both for the contestant 'Tabatha Gehling' and the contestant 'Kelly Clauss'.
voter_1.query: SELECT T3.area_code FROM contestants AS T1 JOIN votes AS T2 ON T1.contestant_number  =  T2.contestant_number JOIN area_code_state AS T3 ON T2.state  =  T3.state WHERE T1.contestant_name  =  'Tabatha Gehling' INTERSECT SELECT T3.area_code FROM contestants AS T1 JOIN votes AS T2 ON T1.contestant_number  =  T2.contestant_number JOIN area_code_state AS T3 ON T2.state  =  T3.state WHERE T1.contestant_name  =  'Kelly Clauss'

voter_1.question: Return the names the contestants whose names contain the substring 'Al'.
voter_1.query: SELECT contestant_name FROM contestants WHERE contestant_name LIKE "%Al%"

orchestra.question: What is the average attendance of shows?
orchestra.query: SELECT avg(Attendance) FROM SHOW

orchestra.question: Return the average attendance across all shows.
orchestra.query: SELECT avg(Attendance) FROM SHOW

orchestra.question: What are the maximum and minimum share of performances whose type is not "Live final".
orchestra.query: SELECT max(SHARE) ,  min(SHARE) FROM performance WHERE TYPE != "Live final"

orchestra.question: Return the maximum and minimum shares for performances that do not have the type "Live final".
orchestra.query: SELECT max(SHARE) ,  min(SHARE) FROM performance WHERE TYPE != "Live final"

orchestra.question: How many different nationalities do conductors have?
orchestra.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT Nationality) FROM conductor

orchestra.question: Count the number of different nationalities of conductors.
orchestra.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT Nationality) FROM conductor

orchestra.question: List names of conductors in descending order of years of work.
orchestra.query: SELECT Name FROM conductor ORDER BY Year_of_Work DESC

orchestra.question: What are the names of conductors, sorted descending by the number of years they have worked?
orchestra.query: SELECT Name FROM conductor ORDER BY Year_of_Work DESC

orchestra.question: List the name of the conductor with the most years of work.
orchestra.query: SELECT Name FROM conductor ORDER BY Year_of_Work DESC LIMIT 1

orchestra.question: What is the name of the conductor who has worked the greatest number of years?
orchestra.query: SELECT Name FROM conductor ORDER BY Year_of_Work DESC LIMIT 1

orchestra.question: Show the names of conductors and the orchestras they have conducted.
orchestra.query: SELECT T1.Name ,  T2.Orchestra FROM conductor AS T1 JOIN orchestra AS T2 ON T1.Conductor_ID  =  T2.Conductor_ID

orchestra.question: What are the names of conductors as well as the corresonding orchestras that they have conducted?
orchestra.query: SELECT T1.Name ,  T2.Orchestra FROM conductor AS T1 JOIN orchestra AS T2 ON T1.Conductor_ID  =  T2.Conductor_ID

orchestra.question: Show the names of conductors that have conducted more than one orchestras.
orchestra.query: SELECT T1.Name FROM conductor AS T1 JOIN orchestra AS T2 ON T1.Conductor_ID  =  T2.Conductor_ID GROUP BY T2.Conductor_ID HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1

orchestra.question: What are the names of conductors who have conducted at more than one orchestra?
orchestra.query: SELECT T1.Name FROM conductor AS T1 JOIN orchestra AS T2 ON T1.Conductor_ID  =  T2.Conductor_ID GROUP BY T2.Conductor_ID HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1

orchestra.question: Show the name of the conductor that has conducted the most number of orchestras.
orchestra.query: SELECT T1.Name FROM conductor AS T1 JOIN orchestra AS T2 ON T1.Conductor_ID  =  T2.Conductor_ID GROUP BY T2.Conductor_ID ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

orchestra.question: What is the name of the conductor who has conducted the most orchestras?
orchestra.query: SELECT T1.Name FROM conductor AS T1 JOIN orchestra AS T2 ON T1.Conductor_ID  =  T2.Conductor_ID GROUP BY T2.Conductor_ID ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

orchestra.question: Please show the name of the conductor that has conducted orchestras founded after 2008.
orchestra.query: SELECT T1.Name FROM conductor AS T1 JOIN orchestra AS T2 ON T1.Conductor_ID  =  T2.Conductor_ID WHERE Year_of_Founded  >  2008

orchestra.question: What are the names of conductors who have conducted orchestras founded after the year 2008?
orchestra.query: SELECT T1.Name FROM conductor AS T1 JOIN orchestra AS T2 ON T1.Conductor_ID  =  T2.Conductor_ID WHERE Year_of_Founded  >  2008

orchestra.question: Please show the different record companies and the corresponding number of orchestras.
orchestra.query: SELECT Record_Company ,  COUNT(*) FROM orchestra GROUP BY Record_Company

orchestra.question: How many orchestras does each record company manage?
orchestra.query: SELECT Record_Company ,  COUNT(*) FROM orchestra GROUP BY Record_Company

orchestra.question: Please show the record formats of orchestras in ascending order of count.
orchestra.query: SELECT Major_Record_Format FROM orchestra GROUP BY Major_Record_Format ORDER BY COUNT(*) ASC

orchestra.question: What are the major record formats of orchestras, sorted by their frequency?
orchestra.query: SELECT Major_Record_Format FROM orchestra GROUP BY Major_Record_Format ORDER BY COUNT(*) ASC

orchestra.question: List the record company shared by the most number of orchestras.
orchestra.query: SELECT Record_Company FROM orchestra GROUP BY Record_Company ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

orchestra.question: What is the record company used by the greatest number of orchestras?
orchestra.query: SELECT Record_Company FROM orchestra GROUP BY Record_Company ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

orchestra.question: List the names of orchestras that have no performance.
orchestra.query: SELECT Orchestra FROM orchestra WHERE Orchestra_ID NOT IN (SELECT Orchestra_ID FROM performance)

orchestra.question: What are the orchestras that do not have any performances?
orchestra.query: SELECT Orchestra FROM orchestra WHERE Orchestra_ID NOT IN (SELECT Orchestra_ID FROM performance)

orchestra.question: Show the record companies shared by orchestras founded before 2003 and after 2003.
orchestra.query: SELECT Record_Company FROM orchestra WHERE Year_of_Founded  <  2003 INTERSECT SELECT Record_Company FROM orchestra WHERE Year_of_Founded  >  2003

orchestra.question: What are the record companies that are used by both orchestras founded before 2003 and those founded after 2003?
orchestra.query: SELECT Record_Company FROM orchestra WHERE Year_of_Founded  <  2003 INTERSECT SELECT Record_Company FROM orchestra WHERE Year_of_Founded  >  2003

orchestra.question: Find the number of orchestras whose record format is "CD" or "DVD".
orchestra.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orchestra WHERE Major_Record_Format  =  "CD" OR Major_Record_Format  =  "DVD"

orchestra.question: Count the number of orchestras that have CD or DVD as their record format.
orchestra.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orchestra WHERE Major_Record_Format  =  "CD" OR Major_Record_Format  =  "DVD"

orchestra.question: Show the years in which orchestras that have given more than one performance are founded.
orchestra.query: SELECT Year_of_Founded FROM orchestra AS T1 JOIN performance AS T2 ON T1.Orchestra_ID  =  T2.Orchestra_ID GROUP BY T2.Orchestra_ID HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1

orchestra.question: What are years of founding for orchestras that have had more than a single performance?
orchestra.query: SELECT Year_of_Founded FROM orchestra AS T1 JOIN performance AS T2 ON T1.Orchestra_ID  =  T2.Orchestra_ID GROUP BY T2.Orchestra_ID HAVING COUNT(*)  >  1

dog_kennels.question: Which states have both owners and professionals living there?
dog_kennels.query: SELECT state FROM Owners INTERSECT SELECT state FROM Professionals

dog_kennels.question: Find the states where both owners and professionals live.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT state FROM Owners INTERSECT SELECT state FROM Professionals

dog_kennels.question: What is the average age of the dogs who have gone through any treatments?
dog_kennels.query: SELECT avg(age) FROM Dogs WHERE dog_id IN ( SELECT dog_id FROM Treatments )

dog_kennels.question: Find the average age of the dogs who went through treatments.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT avg(age) FROM Dogs WHERE dog_id IN ( SELECT dog_id FROM Treatments )

dog_kennels.question: Which professionals live in the state of Indiana or have done treatment on more than 2 treatments? List his or her id, last name and cell phone.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT professional_id ,  last_name ,  cell_number FROM Professionals WHERE state  =  'Indiana' UNION SELECT T1.professional_id ,  T1.last_name ,  T1.cell_number FROM Professionals AS T1 JOIN Treatments AS T2 ON T1.professional_id  =  T2.professional_id GROUP BY T1.professional_id HAVING count(*)  >  2

dog_kennels.question: Find the id, last name and cell phone of the professionals who live in the state of Indiana or have performed more than two treatments.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT professional_id ,  last_name ,  cell_number FROM Professionals WHERE state  =  'Indiana' UNION SELECT T1.professional_id ,  T1.last_name ,  T1.cell_number FROM Professionals AS T1 JOIN Treatments AS T2 ON T1.professional_id  =  T2.professional_id GROUP BY T1.professional_id HAVING count(*)  >  2

dog_kennels.question: Which dogs have not cost their owner more than 1000 for treatment? List the dog names.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT name FROM Dogs WHERE dog_id NOT IN( SELECT dog_id FROM Treatments GROUP BY dog_id HAVING sum(cost_of_treatment)  >  1000 )

dog_kennels.question: What are the names of the dogs for which the owner spent more than 1000 for treatment?
dog_kennels.query: SELECT name FROM Dogs WHERE dog_id NOT IN( SELECT dog_id FROM Treatments GROUP BY dog_id HAVING sum(cost_of_treatment)  >  1000 )

dog_kennels.question: Which first names are used for professionals or owners but are not used as dog names?
dog_kennels.query: SELECT first_name FROM Professionals UNION SELECT first_name FROM Owners EXCEPT SELECT name FROM Dogs

dog_kennels.question: Find the first names that are used for professionals or owners but are not used as dog names.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT first_name FROM Professionals UNION SELECT first_name FROM Owners EXCEPT SELECT name FROM Dogs

dog_kennels.question: Which professional did not operate any treatment on dogs? List the professional's id, role and email.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT professional_id ,  role_code ,  email_address FROM Professionals EXCEPT SELECT T1.professional_id ,  T1.role_code ,  T1.email_address FROM Professionals AS T1 JOIN Treatments AS T2 ON T1.professional_id  =  T2.professional_id

dog_kennels.question: Give me the id, role and email of the professionals who did not perform any treatment on dogs.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT professional_id ,  role_code ,  email_address FROM Professionals EXCEPT SELECT T1.professional_id ,  T1.role_code ,  T1.email_address FROM Professionals AS T1 JOIN Treatments AS T2 ON T1.professional_id  =  T2.professional_id

dog_kennels.question: Which owner owns the most dogs? List the owner id, first name and last name.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT T1.owner_id ,  T2.first_name ,  T2.last_name FROM Dogs AS T1 JOIN Owners AS T2 ON T1.owner_id  =  T2.owner_id GROUP BY T1.owner_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

dog_kennels.question: Return the owner id, first name and last name of the owner who has the most dogs.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT T1.owner_id ,  T2.first_name ,  T2.last_name FROM Dogs AS T1 JOIN Owners AS T2 ON T1.owner_id  =  T2.owner_id GROUP BY T1.owner_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

dog_kennels.question: Which professionals have done at least two treatments? List the professional's id, role, and first name.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT T1.professional_id ,  T1.role_code ,  T1.first_name FROM Professionals AS T1 JOIN Treatments AS T2 ON T1.professional_id  =  T2.professional_id GROUP BY T1.professional_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

dog_kennels.question: What are the id, role, and first name of the professionals who have performed two or more treatments?
dog_kennels.query: SELECT T1.professional_id ,  T1.role_code ,  T1.first_name FROM Professionals AS T1 JOIN Treatments AS T2 ON T1.professional_id  =  T2.professional_id GROUP BY T1.professional_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

dog_kennels.question: What is the name of the breed with the most dogs?
dog_kennels.query: SELECT T1.breed_name FROM Breeds AS T1 JOIN Dogs AS T2 ON T1.breed_code  =  T2.breed_code GROUP BY T1.breed_name ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

dog_kennels.question: Which breed do the most dogs have? Give me the breed name.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT T1.breed_name FROM Breeds AS T1 JOIN Dogs AS T2 ON T1.breed_code  =  T2.breed_code GROUP BY T1.breed_name ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

dog_kennels.question: Which owner has paid for the most treatments on his or her dogs? List the owner id and last name.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT T1.owner_id ,  T1.last_name FROM Owners AS T1 JOIN Dogs AS T2 ON T1.owner_id  =  T2.owner_id JOIN Treatments AS T3 ON T2.dog_id  =  T3.dog_id GROUP BY T1.owner_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

dog_kennels.question: Tell me the owner id and last name of the owner who spent the most on treatments of his or her dogs.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT T1.owner_id ,  T1.last_name FROM Owners AS T1 JOIN Dogs AS T2 ON T1.owner_id  =  T2.owner_id JOIN Treatments AS T3 ON T2.dog_id  =  T3.dog_id GROUP BY T1.owner_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

dog_kennels.question: What is the description of the treatment type that costs the least money in total?
dog_kennels.query: SELECT T1.treatment_type_description FROM Treatment_types AS T1 JOIN Treatments AS T2 ON T1.treatment_type_code  =  T2.treatment_type_code GROUP BY T1.treatment_type_code ORDER BY sum(cost_of_treatment) ASC LIMIT 1

dog_kennels.question: Give me the description of the treatment type whose total cost is the lowest.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT T1.treatment_type_description FROM Treatment_types AS T1 JOIN Treatments AS T2 ON T1.treatment_type_code  =  T2.treatment_type_code GROUP BY T1.treatment_type_code ORDER BY sum(cost_of_treatment) ASC LIMIT 1

dog_kennels.question: Which owner has paid the largest amount of money in total for their dogs? Show the owner id and zip code.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT T1.owner_id ,  T1.zip_code FROM Owners AS T1 JOIN Dogs AS T2 ON T1.owner_id  =  T2.owner_id JOIN Treatments AS T3 ON T2.dog_id  =  T3.dog_id GROUP BY T1.owner_id ORDER BY sum(T3.cost_of_treatment) DESC LIMIT 1

dog_kennels.question: Find the owner id and zip code of the owner who spent the most money in total for his or her dogs.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT T1.owner_id ,  T1.zip_code FROM Owners AS T1 JOIN Dogs AS T2 ON T1.owner_id  =  T2.owner_id JOIN Treatments AS T3 ON T2.dog_id  =  T3.dog_id GROUP BY T1.owner_id ORDER BY sum(T3.cost_of_treatment) DESC LIMIT 1

dog_kennels.question: Which professionals have done at least two types of treatments? List the professional id and cell phone.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT T1.professional_id ,  T1.cell_number FROM Professionals AS T1 JOIN Treatments AS T2 ON T1.professional_id  =  T2.professional_id GROUP BY T1.professional_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

dog_kennels.question: Find the id and cell phone of the professionals who operate two or more types of treatments.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT T1.professional_id ,  T1.cell_number FROM Professionals AS T1 JOIN Treatments AS T2 ON T1.professional_id  =  T2.professional_id GROUP BY T1.professional_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

dog_kennels.question: What are the first name and last name of the professionals who have done treatment with cost below average?
dog_kennels.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name FROM Professionals AS T1 JOIN Treatments AS T2 WHERE cost_of_treatment  <  ( SELECT avg(cost_of_treatment) FROM Treatments )

dog_kennels.question: Which professionals have operated a treatment that costs less than the average? Give me theor first names and last names.
dog_kennels.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.first_name ,  T1.last_name FROM Professionals AS T1 JOIN Treatments AS T2 WHERE cost_of_treatment  <  ( SELECT avg(cost_of_treatment) FROM Treatments )

dog_kennels.question: List the date of each treatment, together with the first name of the professional who operated it.

scholar.question: papers that are coauthored by Peter Mertens and Dina Barbian
scholar.query: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid FROM writes AS t3 JOIN author AS t2 ON t3.authorid  =  t2.authorid JOIN writes AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t4.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t2.authorname  =  "Peter Mertens" AND t1.authorname  =  "Dina Barbian";

scholar.query: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid FROM writes AS t3 JOIN author AS t2 ON t3.authorid  =  t2.authorid JOIN writes AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t4.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t2.authorname  =  "Peter Mertens" AND t1.authorname  =  "Dina Barbian";

scholar.question: which EMNLP 2010 papers have the most citations ?

scholar.query: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "Su-In Lee" AND t3.year  <  2012;

scholar.question: papers in semantic parsing for each year
scholar.query: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t3.paperid )  ,  t3.year FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "semantic parsing" GROUP BY t3.year ORDER BY t3.year DESC;

scholar.question: papers with at least 5 citations
scholar.query: SELECT DISTINCT t2.citingpaperid FROM paper AS t1 JOIN cite AS t2 ON t1.paperid  =  t2.citedpaperid GROUP BY t2.citingpaperid HAVING COUNT ( DISTINCT t2.citedpaperid )  >=  5;

scholar.question: papers cited by at least 5 papers
scholar.query: SELECT DISTINCT t2.citingpaperid FROM paper AS t1 JOIN cite AS t2 ON t1.paperid  =  t2.citedpaperid GROUP BY t2.citingpaperid HAVING COUNT ( DISTINCT t2.citedpaperid )  >=  5;

scholar.question: What is the most cited paper at sigcomm ?
scholar.query: SELECT DISTINCT t3.citedpaperid  ,  COUNT ( t3.citingpaperid ) FROM paper AS t1 JOIN cite AS t3 ON t1.paperid  =  t3.citedpaperid JOIN venue AS t2 ON t2.venueid  =  t1.venueid WHERE t2.venuename  =  "sigcomm" GROUP BY t3.citedpaperid ORDER BY COUNT ( t3.citingpaperid ) DESC;

scholar.question: What is the name of Ranjit Jhala 's Liquid Haskell paper ?
scholar.query: SELECT DISTINCT t3.title FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t5 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t5.keyphraseid JOIN writes AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t4.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t4.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname LIKE "Ranjit Jhala" AND t5.keyphrasename  =  "Liquid Haskell";

yelp.question: Find the average number of checkins in restaurant " Barrio Cafe " per day
yelp.query: SELECT AVG ( t3.count )  ,  t3.day FROM category AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id JOIN checkin AS t3 ON t3.business_id  =  t1.business_id WHERE t1.name  =  "Barrio Cafe" AND t2.category_name  =  "restaurant" GROUP BY t3.day;

yelp.question: How many businesses are there in the " Stone Meadows " neighbourhood in Madison ?
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT t1.name ) FROM neighbourhood AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id WHERE t1.city  =  "Madison" AND t2.neighbourhood_name  =  "Stone Meadows";

yelp.question: How many reviews has Adrienne written ?
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT t1.text ) FROM USER AS t2 JOIN review AS t1 ON t2.user_id  =  t1.user_id WHERE t2.name  =  "Adrienne";

yelp.question: How many reviews has Michelle written in March 2014 ?
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT t1.text ) FROM USER AS t2 JOIN review AS t1 ON t2.user_id  =  t1.user_id WHERE t1.month  =  "March" AND t1.year  =  2014 AND t2.name  =  "Michelle";

yelp.question: How many businesses has Michelle reviewed in 2010 ?
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT t1.name ) FROM review AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id JOIN USER AS t3 ON t3.user_id  =  t2.user_id WHERE t2.year  =  2010 AND t3.name  =  "Michelle";

yelp.question: How many businesses in " San Diego " has Christine reviewed in 2010 ?
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT t1.name ) FROM review AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id JOIN USER AS t3 ON t3.user_id  =  t2.user_id WHERE t1.city  =  "San Diego" AND t2.year  =  2010 AND t3.name  =  "Christine";

yelp.question: How many Target are there in " Los Angeles " ?
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT business_id ) FROM business WHERE city  =  "Los Angeles" AND name  =  "Target";

yelp.question: How many users have reviewed Irish Pub in Dallas ?
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT t4.name ) FROM category AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id JOIN review AS t3 ON t3.business_id  =  t1.business_id JOIN USER AS t4 ON t4.user_id  =  t3.user_id WHERE t1.city  =  "Dallas" AND t2.category_name  =  "Irish Pub";

yelp.question: What is the average rating of reviews written in year 2014 ?
yelp.query: SELECT AVG ( rating ) FROM review WHERE YEAR  =  2014;

yelp.question: How many people reviewed restaurant " Vintner Grill " in 2010 ?
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT t4.name ) FROM category AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id JOIN review AS t3 ON t3.business_id  =  t1.business_id JOIN USER AS t4 ON t4.user_id  =  t3.user_id WHERE t1.name  =  "Vintner Grill" AND t2.category_name  =  "category_category_name0" AND t3.year  =  2010;

yelp.question: Find the number of reviews on businesses located in " South Summerlin " neighbourhood
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT t3.text ) FROM neighbourhood AS t1 JOIN business AS t2 ON t1.business_id  =  t2.business_id JOIN review AS t3 ON t3.business_id  =  t2.business_id WHERE t1.neighbourhood_name  =  "South Summerlin";

yelp.question: Find the number of users called Michelle
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT name ) FROM USER WHERE name  =  "Michelle";

yelp.question: Return me the number of businesses that are restaurant .
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT t1.name ) FROM category AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id WHERE t2.category_name  =  "restaurant";

yelp.question: Return me the number of cities that has " Panda Express " .
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT city ) FROM business WHERE name  =  "Panda Express";

yelp.question: Return me the number of tips that are written by Michelle .
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT t1.text ) FROM USER AS t2 JOIN tip AS t1 ON t2.user_id  =  t1.user_id WHERE t2.name  =  "Michelle";

yelp.question: Find the total checkins in " Brighton Heights " neighbourhood
yelp.query: SELECT SUM ( t3.count ) FROM checkin AS t3 JOIN business AS t1 ON t3.business_id  =  t1.business_id JOIN neighbourhood AS t2 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id WHERE t2.neighbourhood_name  =  "Brighton Heights";

yelp.question: Find the total number of reviews written in March
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT text ) FROM review WHERE MONTH  =  "March";

yelp.question: Find the number of tips written in each month
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT text )  ,  MONTH FROM tip GROUP BY MONTH;

yelp.question: How many neighbourhoods have a business with rating 5 in Madison ?
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT t1.neighbourhood_name ) FROM neighbourhood AS t1 JOIN business AS t2 ON t1.business_id  =  t2.business_id WHERE t2.city  =  "Madison" AND t2.rating  =  5;

yelp.question: Give me all the Moroccan restaurant in Texas
yelp.query: SELECT t1.name FROM category AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id JOIN category AS t3 ON t3.business_id  =  t1.business_id WHERE t1.state  =  "Texas" AND t2.category_name  =  "Moroccan" AND t3.category_name  =  "restaurant";

yelp.question: which business has the most number of checkins
yelp.query: SELECT t1.name FROM checkin AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id GROUP BY t1.name ORDER BY SUM ( t2.count ) DESC LIMIT 1;

yelp.question: which neighbourhood has the most number of businesses in Madison
yelp.query: SELECT t1.neighbourhood_name FROM neighbourhood AS t1 JOIN business AS t2 ON t1.business_id  =  t2.business_id WHERE t2.city  =  "Madison" GROUP BY t1.neighbourhood_name ORDER BY COUNT ( DISTINCT t2.name ) DESC LIMIT 1;

yelp.question: Find all Mexican restaurant in Dallas with at least 3.5 stars
yelp.query: SELECT t1.name FROM category AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id JOIN category AS t3 ON t3.business_id  =  t1.business_id WHERE t1.city  =  "Dallas" AND t1.rating  >  3.5 AND t2.category_name  =  "Mexican" AND t3.category_name  =  "restaurant";

yelp.question: Find all Mexican restaurant in Dallas with a rating above 3.5
yelp.query: SELECT t1.name FROM category AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id JOIN category AS t3 ON t3.business_id  =  t1.business_id WHERE t1.city  =  "Dallas" AND t1.rating  >  3.5 AND t2.category_name  =  "Mexican" AND t3.category_name  =  "restaurant";

yelp.question: Find all restaurant with Valet Service in Dallas Texas
yelp.query: SELECT t1.name FROM category AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id JOIN category AS t3 ON t3.business_id  =  t1.business_id WHERE t1.city  =  "Dallas" AND t1.state  =  "Texas" AND t2.category_name  =  "Valet Service" AND t3.category_name  =  "restaurant";

yelp.question: Find all Italian restaurant in the Meadowood neighbourhood of Madison
yelp.query: SELECT t1.name FROM category AS t3 JOIN business AS t1 ON t3.business_id  =  t1.business_id JOIN category AS t4 ON t4.business_id  =  t1.business_id JOIN neighbourhood AS t2 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id WHERE t1.city  =  "Madison" AND t3.category_name  =  "Italian" AND t4.category_name  =  "restaurant" AND t2.neighbourhood_name  =  "Meadowood";

yelp.question: Find all Bars in " Los Angeles " with at least 30 reviews and average rating above 3 stars
yelp.query: SELECT t1.name FROM category AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id WHERE t1.city  =  "Los Angeles" AND t1.rating  >  3 AND t1.review_count  >  30 AND t2.category_name  =  "Bars";

yelp.question: How many Egyptian restaurant are there in Edinburgh ?
yelp.query: SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT t1.name ) FROM category AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id JOIN category AS t3 ON t3.business_id  =  t1.business_id WHERE t1.city  =  "Edinburgh" AND t2.category_name  =  "restaurant" AND t3.category_name  =  "Egyptian";

yelp.question: Find users whose average review rating is below 3
yelp.query: SELECT t2.name FROM USER AS t2 JOIN review AS t1 ON t2.user_id  =  t1.user_id GROUP BY t2.name HAVING AVG ( t1.rating )  <  3;

yelp.question: Find the business with the most number of reviews in April
yelp.query: SELECT t1.name FROM review AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id WHERE t2.month  =  "April" GROUP BY t1.name ORDER BY COUNT ( DISTINCT t2.text ) DESC LIMIT 1;

yelp.question: Find the business which has the most number of categories
yelp.query: SELECT t1.name FROM category AS t2 JOIN business AS t1 ON t2.business_id  =  t1.business_id GROUP BY t1.name ORDER BY COUNT ( DISTINCT t2.category_name ) DESC LIMIT 1;

imdb.query: SELECT t1.name FROM director AS t3 JOIN directed_by AS t2 ON t3.did  =  t2.did JOIN movie AS t4 ON t4.mid  =  t2.msid JOIN made_by AS t5 ON t4.mid  =  t5.msid JOIN producer AS t1 ON t1.pid  =  t5.pid GROUP BY t1.name ORDER BY COUNT ( DISTINCT t3.name  ) DESC LIMIT 1;

department_management.question: How many heads of the departments are older than 56 ?
department_management.query: SELECT count(*) FROM head WHERE age  >  56

department_management.question: List the name, born state and age of the heads of departments ordered by age.
department_management.query: SELECT name ,  born_state ,  age FROM head ORDER BY age

department_management.question: List the creation year, name and budget of each department.
department_management.query: SELECT creation ,  name ,  budget_in_billions FROM department

department_management.question: What are the maximum and minimum budget of the departments?
What is the average number of employees of the departments whose rank is between 10 and 15?
department_management.query: SELECT avg(num_employees) FROM department WHERE ranking BETWEEN 10 AND 15

department_management.question: What are the names of the heads who are born outside the California state?
department_management.query: SELECT name FROM head WHERE born_state != 'California'

department_management.question: What are the distinct creation years of the departments managed by a secretary born in state 'Alabama'?
department_management.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.creation FROM department AS T1 JOIN management AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id JOIN head AS T3 ON T2.head_id  =  T3.head_id WHERE T3.born_state  =  'Alabama'

department_management.question: What are the names of the states where at least 3 heads were born?
department_management.query: SELECT born_state FROM head GROUP BY born_state HAVING count(*)  >=  3

department_management.question: In which year were most departments established?
department_management.query: SELECT creation FROM department GROUP BY creation ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

department_management.question: Show the name and number of employees for the departments managed by heads whose temporary acting value is 'Yes'?
department_management.query: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.num_employees FROM department AS T1 JOIN management AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id WHERE T2.temporary_acting  =  'Yes'

department_management.question: How many acting statuses are there?
How many departments are led by heads who are not mentioned?
department_management.query: SELECT count(*) FROM department WHERE department_id NOT IN (SELECT department_id FROM management);

department_management.question: What are the distinct ages of the heads who are acting?
department_management.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.age FROM management AS T2 JOIN head AS T1 ON T1.head_id  =  T2.head_id WHERE T2.temporary_acting  =  'Yes'

department_management.question: List the states where both the secretary of 'Treasury' department and the secretary of 'Homeland Security' were born.
department_management.query: SELECT T3.born_state FROM department AS T1 JOIN management AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id JOIN head AS T3 ON T2.head_id  =  T3.head_id WHERE T1.name  =  'Treasury' INTERSECT SELECT T3.born_state FROM department AS T1 JOIN management AS T2 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id JOIN head AS T3 ON T2.head_id  =  T3.head_id WHERE T1.name  =  'Homeland Security'

department_management.question: Which department has more than 1 head at a time? List the id, name and the number of heads.
department_management.query: SELECT T1.department_id ,  T1.name ,  count(*) FROM management AS T2 JOIN department AS T1 ON T1.department_id  =  T2.department_id GROUP BY T1.department_id HAVING count(*)  >  1

department_management.question: Which head's name has the substring 'Ha'? List the id and name.
department_management.query: SELECT head_id ,  name FROM head WHERE name LIKE '%Ha%'

bike_1.question: What is the latitude, longitude, and city of the station from which the trip with smallest duration started?

bike_1.question: What are the ids of stations that are located in San Francisco and have average bike availability above 10.
bike_1.query: SELECT id FROM station WHERE city  =  "San Francisco" INTERSECT SELECT station_id FROM status GROUP BY station_id HAVING avg(bikes_available)  >  10

bike_1.question: What are the ids of the stations in San Francisco that normally have more than 10 bikes available?
bike_1.query: SELECT id FROM station WHERE city  =  "San Francisco" INTERSECT SELECT station_id FROM status GROUP BY station_id HAVING avg(bikes_available)  >  10

bike_1.question: What are the names and ids of stations that had more than 14 bikes available on average or were installed in December?
bike_1.query: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.id FROM station AS T1 JOIN status AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.station_id GROUP BY T2.station_id HAVING avg(T2.bikes_available)  >  14 UNION SELECT name ,  id FROM station WHERE installation_date LIKE "12/%"

bike_1.question: What are the names and ids of all stations that have more than 14 bikes available on average or had bikes installed in December?
bike_1.query: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.id FROM station AS T1 JOIN status AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.station_id GROUP BY T2.station_id HAVING avg(T2.bikes_available)  >  14 UNION SELECT name ,  id FROM station WHERE installation_date LIKE "12/%"

bike_1.question: What is the 3 most common cloud cover rates in the region of zip code 94107?
bike_1.query: SELECT cloud_cover FROM weather WHERE zip_code  =  94107 GROUP BY cloud_cover ORDER BY COUNT (*) DESC LIMIT 3

bike_1.question: What are the 3 most common cloud covers in the zip code of 94107?
bike_1.query: SELECT cloud_cover FROM weather WHERE zip_code  =  94107 GROUP BY cloud_cover ORDER BY COUNT (*) DESC LIMIT 3

bike_1.question: What is the zip code in which the average mean sea level pressure is the lowest?
bike_1.query: SELECT zip_code FROM weather GROUP BY zip_code ORDER BY avg(mean_sea_level_pressure_inches) LIMIT 1

bike_1.question: What is the zip code that has the lowest average mean sea level pressure?
bike_1.query: SELECT zip_code FROM weather GROUP BY zip_code ORDER BY avg(mean_sea_level_pressure_inches) LIMIT 1

bike_1.question: What is the average bike availability in stations that are not located in Palo Alto?
bike_1.query: SELECT avg(bikes_available) FROM status WHERE station_id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM station WHERE city  =  "Palo Alto")

bike_1.question: What is the average bike availablility for stations not in Palo Alto?
bike_1.query: SELECT avg(bikes_available) FROM status WHERE station_id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM station WHERE city  =  "Palo Alto")

bike_1.question: What is the average longitude of stations that never had bike availability more than 10?
bike_1.query: SELECT avg(long) FROM station WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT station_id FROM status GROUP BY station_id HAVING max(bikes_available)  >  10)

bike_1.question: What is the mean longitude for all stations that have never had more than 10 bikes available?
bike_1.query: SELECT avg(long) FROM station WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT station_id FROM status GROUP BY station_id HAVING max(bikes_available)  >  10)

bike_1.question: When and in what zip code did max temperature reach 80?
bike_1.query: SELECT date ,  zip_code FROM weather WHERE max_temperature_f  >=  80

bike_1.question: What zip codes have a station with a max temperature greater than or equal to 80 and when did it reach that temperature?
bike_1.query: SELECT date ,  zip_code FROM weather WHERE max_temperature_f  >=  80

bike_1.question: Give me ids for all the trip that took place in a zip code area with average mean temperature above 60.
bike_1.query: SELECT T1.id FROM trip AS T1 JOIN weather AS T2 ON T1.zip_code  =  T2.zip_code GROUP BY T2.zip_code HAVING avg(T2.mean_temperature_f)  >  60

bike_1.question: For each zip code, find the ids of all trips that have a higher average mean temperature above 60?
bike_1.query: SELECT T1.id FROM trip AS T1 JOIN weather AS T2 ON T1.zip_code  =  T2.zip_code GROUP BY T2.zip_code HAVING avg(T2.mean_temperature_f)  >  60

bike_1.question: For each zip code, return how many times max wind speed reached 25?
bike_1.query: SELECT zip_code , count(*) FROM weather WHERE max_wind_Speed_mph  >=  25 GROUP BY zip_code

bike_1.question: For each zip code, how many times has the maximum wind speed reached 25 mph?
bike_1.query: SELECT zip_code , count(*) FROM weather WHERE max_wind_Speed_mph  >=  25 GROUP BY zip_code

bike_1.question: On which day and in which zip code was the min dew point lower than any day in zip code 94107?
bike_1.query: SELECT date ,  zip_code FROM weather WHERE min_dew_point_f  <  (SELECT min(min_dew_point_f) FROM weather WHERE zip_code  =  94107)

bike_1.question: Which days had a minimum dew point smaller than any day in zip code 94107, and in which zip codes were those measurements taken?
bike_1.query: SELECT date ,  zip_code FROM weather WHERE min_dew_point_f  <  (SELECT min(min_dew_point_f) FROM weather WHERE zip_code  =  94107)

bike_1.question: For each trip, return its ending station's installation date.
bike_1.query: SELECT T1.id ,  T2.installation_date FROM trip AS T1 JOIN station AS T2 ON T1.end_station_id  =  T2.id

bike_1.question: What is the installation date for each ending station on all the trips?

bike_1.question: Which trip started from the station with the largest dock count? Give me the trip id.
bike_1.query: SELECT T1.id FROM trip AS T1 JOIN station AS T2 ON T1.start_station_id  =  T2.id ORDER BY T2.dock_count DESC LIMIT 1

bike_1.question: What is the id of the trip that started from the station with the highest dock count?
bike_1.query: SELECT T1.id FROM trip AS T1 JOIN station AS T2 ON T1.start_station_id  =  T2.id ORDER BY T2.dock_count DESC LIMIT 1

bike_1.question: Count the number of trips that did not end in San Francisco city.

bike_1.question: How many trips did not end in San Francisco?
bike_1.query: SELECT count(*) FROM trip AS T1 JOIN station AS T2 ON T1.end_station_id  =  T2.id WHERE T2.city != "San Francisco"

bike_1.question: In zip code 94107, on which day neither Fog nor Rain was not observed?
bike_1.query: SELECT date FROM weather WHERE zip_code  =  94107 AND EVENTS != "Fog" AND EVENTS != "Rain"

bike_1.question: On which day has it neither been foggy nor rained in the zip code of 94107?
bike_1.query: SELECT date FROM weather WHERE zip_code  =  94107 AND EVENTS != "Fog" AND EVENTS != "Rain"

bike_1.question: What are the ids of stations that have latitude above 37.4 and never had bike availability below 7?
bike_1.query: SELECT id FROM station WHERE lat  >  37.4 EXCEPT SELECT station_id FROM status GROUP BY station_id HAVING min(bikes_available)  <  7

bike_1.question: How many trips started from Mountain View city and ended at Palo Alto city?
bike_1.query: SELECT count(*) FROM station AS T1 JOIN trip AS T2 JOIN station AS T3 JOIN trip AS T4 ON T1.id  =  T2.start_station_id AND T2.id  =  T4.id AND T3.id  =  T4.end_station_id WHERE T1.city  =  "Mountain View" AND T3.city  =  "Palo Alto"

bike_1.question: How many trips stated from  a station in Mountain View and ended at one in Palo Alto?

twitter_1.query: SELECT count(*) FROM tweets

twitter_1.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT UID) FROM tweets

twitter_1.question: Find the name and email of the user whose name contains the word ‘Swift’.
twitter_1.query: SELECT name ,  email FROM user_profiles WHERE name LIKE '%Swift%'

twitter_1.query: SELECT name FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%superstar%' OR email LIKE '%edu%'

twitter_1.query: SELECT text FROM tweets WHERE text LIKE '%intern%'

twitter_1.question: Find the name and email of the users who have more than 1000 followers.
twitter_1.query: SELECT name ,  email FROM user_profiles WHERE followers  >  1000

twitter_1.question: Find the names of the users whose number of followers is greater than that of the user named "Tyler Swift".
twitter_1.query: SELECT T1.name FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN follows AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.f1 GROUP BY T2.f1 HAVING count(*)  >  (SELECT count(*) FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN follows AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.f1 WHERE T1.name  =  'Tyler Swift')

twitter_1.question: Find the name and email for the users who have more than one follower.
twitter_1.query: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.email FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN follows AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.f1 GROUP BY T2.f1 HAVING count(*)  >  1

twitter_1.question: Find the names of users who have more than one tweet.
twitter_1.query: SELECT T1.name FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN tweets AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.uid GROUP BY T2.uid HAVING count(*)  >  1

twitter_1.question: Find the id of users who are followed by Mary and Susan.
twitter_1.query: SELECT T2.f1 FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN follows AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.f2 WHERE T1.name  =  "Mary" INTERSECT SELECT T2.f1 FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN follows AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.f2 WHERE T1.name  =  "Susan"

twitter_1.question: Find the id of users who are followed by Mary or Susan.
twitter_1.query: SELECT T2.f1 FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN follows AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.f2 WHERE T1.name  =  "Mary" OR T1.name  =  "Susan"

twitter_1.question: Find the name of the user who has the largest number of followers.
twitter_1.query: SELECT name FROM user_profiles ORDER BY followers DESC LIMIT 1

twitter_1.query: SELECT name ,  email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY followers LIMIT 1

twitter_1.query: SELECT name ,  followers FROM user_profiles ORDER BY followers DESC

twitter_1.question: List the names of 5 users followed by the largest number of other users.
twitter_1.query: SELECT name FROM user_profiles ORDER BY followers DESC LIMIT 5

twitter_1.question: List the text of all tweets in the order of date.
twitter_1.query: SELECT text FROM tweets ORDER BY createdate

twitter_1.question: Find the name of each user and number of tweets tweeted by each of them.
twitter_1.query: SELECT T1.name ,  count(*) FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN tweets AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.uid GROUP BY T2.uid

twitter_1.question: Find the name and partition id for users who tweeted less than twice.
twitter_1.query: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.partitionid FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN tweets AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.uid GROUP BY T2.uid HAVING count(*)  <  2

twitter_1.question: Find the name of the user who tweeted more than once, and number of tweets tweeted by them.
twitter_1.query: SELECT T1.name ,  count(*) FROM user_profiles AS T1 JOIN tweets AS T2 ON T1.uid  =  T2.uid GROUP BY T2.uid HAVING count(*)  >  1

twitter_1.question: Find the average number of followers for the users who do not have any tweet.
twitter_1.query: SELECT avg(followers) FROM user_profiles WHERE UID NOT IN (SELECT UID FROM tweets)

twitter_1.query: SELECT avg(followers) FROM user_profiles WHERE UID IN (SELECT UID FROM tweets)

twitter_1.query: SELECT max(followers) ,  sum(followers) FROM user_profiles

flight_1.query: SELECT T3.name FROM Employee AS T1 JOIN Certificate AS T2 ON T1.eid  =  T2.eid JOIN Aircraft AS T3 ON T3.aid  =  T2.aid WHERE T1.name  =  "John Williams"

flight_1.question: What are the names of all aircrafts that John Williams have certificates to be able to fly?
flight_1.query: SELECT T3.name FROM Employee AS T1 JOIN Certificate AS T2 ON T1.eid  =  T2.eid JOIN Aircraft AS T3 ON T3.aid  =  T2.aid WHERE T1.name  =  "John Williams"

flight_1.question: Show names for all employees who have certificate of Boeing 737-800.
flight_1.query: SELECT T1.name FROM Employee AS T1 JOIN Certificate AS T2 ON T1.eid  =  T2.eid JOIN Aircraft AS T3 ON T3.aid  =  T2.aid WHERE T3.name  =  "Boeing 737-800"

flight_1.question: What are the names of all employees who have a certificate to fly Boeing 737-800?
flight_1.query: SELECT T1.name FROM Employee AS T1 JOIN Certificate AS T2 ON T1.eid  =  T2.eid JOIN Aircraft AS T3 ON T3.aid  =  T2.aid WHERE T3.name  =  "Boeing 737-800"

flight_1.question: Show names for all employees who have certificates on both Boeing 737-800 and Airbus A340-300.
flight_1.query: SELECT T1.name FROM Employee AS T1 JOIN Certificate AS T2 ON T1.eid  =  T2.eid JOIN Aircraft AS T3 ON T3.aid  =  T2.aid WHERE T3.name  =  "Boeing 737-800" INTERSECT SELECT T1.name FROM Employee AS T1 JOIN Certificate AS T2 ON T1.eid  =  T2.eid JOIN Aircraft AS T3 ON T3.aid  =  T2.aid WHERE T3.name  =  "Airbus A340-300"

flight_1.question: What are the names of all employees who can fly both the Boeing 737-800 and the Airbus A340-300?
flight_1.query: SELECT T1.name FROM Employee AS T1 JOIN Certificate AS T2 ON T1.eid  =  T2.eid JOIN Aircraft AS T3 ON T3.aid  =  T2.aid WHERE T3.name  =  "Boeing 737-800" INTERSECT SELECT T1.name FROM Employee AS T1 JOIN Certificate AS T2 ON T1.eid  =  T2.eid JOIN Aircraft AS T3 ON T3.aid  =  T2.aid WHERE T3.name  =  "Airbus A340-300"

flight_1.question: Show names for all employees who do not have certificate of Boeing 737-800.
flight_1.query: SELECT name FROM Employee EXCEPT SELECT T1.name FROM Employee AS T1 JOIN Certificate AS T2 ON T1.eid  =  T2.eid JOIN Aircraft AS T3 ON T3.aid  =  T2.aid WHERE T3.name  =  "Boeing 737-800"

flight_1.question: What are the names of all employees who are not certified to fly Boeing 737-800s?
flight_1.query: SELECT name FROM Employee EXCEPT SELECT T1.name FROM Employee AS T1 JOIN Certificate AS T2 ON T1.eid  =  T2.eid JOIN Aircraft AS T3 ON T3.aid  =  T2.aid WHERE T3.name  =  "Boeing 737-800"

flight_1.question: Show the name of aircraft which fewest people have its certificate.
flight_1.query: SELECT T2.name FROM Certificate AS T1 JOIN Aircraft AS T2 ON T2.aid  =  T1.aid GROUP BY T1.aid ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

flight_1.question: What are the names of the aircraft that the least people are certified to fly?
flight_1.query: SELECT T2.name FROM Certificate AS T1 JOIN Aircraft AS T2 ON T2.aid  =  T1.aid GROUP BY T1.aid ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

flight_1.question: Show the name and distance of the aircrafts with more than 5000 distance and which at least 5 people have its certificate.
flight_1.query: SELECT T2.name FROM Certificate AS T1 JOIN Aircraft AS T2 ON T2.aid  =  T1.aid WHERE T2.distance  >  5000 GROUP BY T1.aid ORDER BY count(*)  >=  5

flight_1.question: What is the name and distance of every aircraft that can cover a distance of more than 5000 and which at least 5 people can fly?
flight_1.query: SELECT T2.name FROM Certificate AS T1 JOIN Aircraft AS T2 ON T2.aid  =  T1.aid WHERE T2.distance  >  5000 GROUP BY T1.aid ORDER BY count(*)  >=  5

flight_1.question: what is the salary and name of the employee who has the most number of aircraft certificates?
flight_1.query: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.salary FROM Employee AS T1 JOIN Certificate AS T2 ON T1.eid  =  T2.eid GROUP BY T1.eid ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

flight_1.question: What is the salaray and name of the employee that is certified to fly the most planes?
flight_1.query: SELECT T1.name ,  T1.salary FROM Employee AS T1 JOIN Certificate AS T2 ON T1.eid  =  T2.eid GROUP BY T1.eid ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

flight_1.question: What is the salary and name of the employee who has the most number of certificates on aircrafts with distance more than 5000?
flight_1.query: SELECT T1.name FROM Employee AS T1 JOIN Certificate AS T2 ON T1.eid  =  T2.eid JOIN Aircraft AS T3 ON T3.aid  =  T2.aid WHERE T3.distance  >  5000 GROUP BY T1.eid ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

flight_1.question: What is the salaray and name of the employee with the most certificates to fly planes more than 5000?
flight_1.query: SELECT T1.name FROM Employee AS T1 JOIN Certificate AS T2 ON T1.eid  =  T2.eid JOIN Aircraft AS T3 ON T3.aid  =  T2.aid WHERE T3.distance  >  5000 GROUP BY T1.eid ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
