tracking_orders.question: What is the id of the order which has the most items?
tracking_orders.query: SELECT T1.order_id FROM orders AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id GROUP BY T1.order_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

tracking_orders.question: Which order deals with the most items? Return the order id.
tracking_orders.query: SELECT T1.order_id FROM orders AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id GROUP BY T1.order_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

tracking_orders.question: What is the name of the customer who has the largest number of orders?
tracking_orders.query: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

tracking_orders.question: Find the name of the customer who made the most orders.
tracking_orders.query: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

tracking_orders.question: Find the invoice numbers which are created before 1989-09-03 or after 2007-12-25.
tracking_orders.query: SELECT invoice_number FROM invoices WHERE invoice_date < "1989-09-03" OR invoice_date > "2007-12-25"

tracking_orders.question: What are the invoice numbers created before 1989-09-03 or after 2007-12-25?
tracking_orders.query: SELECT invoice_number FROM invoices WHERE invoice_date < "1989-09-03" OR invoice_date > "2007-12-25"

tracking_orders.question: Find the distinct details of invoices which are created before 1989-09-03 or after 2007-12-25.
tracking_orders.query: SELECT DISTINCT invoice_details FROM invoices WHERE invoice_date < "1989-09-03" OR invoice_date > "2007-12-25"

tracking_orders.question: What are the distinct details of invoices created before 1989-09-03 or after 2007-12-25?
tracking_orders.query: SELECT DISTINCT invoice_details FROM invoices WHERE invoice_date < "1989-09-03" OR invoice_date > "2007-12-25"

tracking_orders.question: For each customer who has at least two orders, find the customer name and number of orders made.
tracking_orders.query: SELECT T2.customer_name ,  count(*) FROM orders AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T2.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

tracking_orders.question: Which customers have made at least two orders? Give me each customer name and number of orders made.
tracking_orders.query: SELECT T2.customer_name ,  count(*) FROM orders AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T2.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  2

tracking_orders.question: Find the name of the customers who have at most two orders.
tracking_orders.query: SELECT T2.customer_name FROM orders AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T2.customer_id HAVING count(*)  <=  2

tracking_orders.question: What are the names of the customers who have made two or less orders?
tracking_orders.query: SELECT T2.customer_name FROM orders AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T2.customer_id HAVING count(*)  <=  2

tracking_orders.question: List the names of the customers who have once bought product "food".
tracking_orders.query: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 JOIN order_items AS T3 JOIN products AS T4 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id AND T2.order_id = T3.order_id AND T3.product_id = T4.product_id WHERE T4.product_name = "food" GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  1

tracking_orders.question: What are the names of the customers who bought product "food" at least once?
tracking_orders.query: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 JOIN order_items AS T3 JOIN products AS T4 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id AND T2.order_id = T3.order_id AND T3.product_id = T4.product_id WHERE T4.product_name = "food" GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  1

tracking_orders.question: List the names of customers who have once canceled the purchase of the product "food" (the item status is "Cancel").
tracking_orders.query: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 JOIN order_items AS T3 JOIN products AS T4 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id AND T2.order_id = T3.order_id AND T3.product_id = T4.product_id WHERE T3.order_item_status = "Cancel" AND T4.product_name = "food" GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  1

tracking_orders.question: Which customers have ever canceled the purchase of the product "food" (the item status is "Cancel")?
tracking_orders.query: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN orders AS T2 JOIN order_items AS T3 JOIN products AS T4 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id AND T2.order_id = T3.order_id AND T3.product_id = T4.product_id WHERE T3.order_item_status = "Cancel" AND T4.product_name = "food" GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >=  1

architecture.question: How many architects are female?
architecture.query: SELECT count(*) FROM architect WHERE gender  =  'female'

architecture.question: List the name, nationality and id of all male architects ordered by their names lexicographically.
architecture.query: SELECT name ,  nationality ,  id FROM architect WHERE gender  =  'male' ORDER BY name

architecture.question: What is the maximum length in meters for the bridges and what are the architects' names?
architecture.query: SELECT max(T1.length_meters) ,  T2.name FROM bridge AS T1 JOIN architect AS T2 ON T1.architect_id  =  T2.id

architecture.question: What is the average length in feet of the bridges?
What are the names and year of construction for the mills of 'Grondzeiler' type?
architecture.query: SELECT name ,  built_year FROM mill WHERE TYPE  =  'Grondzeiler'

architecture.question: What are the distinct names and nationalities of the architects who have ever built a mill?
architecture.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.name ,  T1.nationality FROM architect AS T1 JOIN mill AS t2 ON T1.id  =  T2.architect_id

architecture.question: What are the names of the mills which are not located in 'Donceel'?
architecture.query: SELECT name FROM mill WHERE LOCATION != 'Donceel'

architecture.question: What are the distinct types of mills that are built by American or Canadian architects?
architecture.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.type FROM mill AS T1 JOIN architect AS t2 ON T1.architect_id  =  T2.id WHERE T2.nationality  =  'American' OR T2.nationality  =  'Canadian'

architecture.question: What are the ids and names of the architects who built at least 3 bridges ?
architecture.query: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name FROM architect AS T1 JOIN bridge AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.architect_id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  >=  3

architecture.question: What is the id, name and nationality of the architect who built most mills?
architecture.query: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name ,  T1.nationality FROM architect AS T1 JOIN mill AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.architect_id GROUP BY T1.id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

architecture.question: What are the ids, names and genders of the architects who built two bridges or one mill?
architecture.query: SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name ,  T1.gender FROM architect AS T1 JOIN bridge AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.architect_id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  =  2 UNION SELECT T1.id ,  T1.name ,  T1.gender FROM architect AS T1 JOIN mill AS T2 ON T1.id  =  T2.architect_id GROUP BY T1.id HAVING count(*)  =  1

architecture.question: What is the location of the bridge named 'Kolob Arch' or 'Rainbow Bridge'?
architecture.query: SELECT LOCATION FROM bridge WHERE name  =  'Kolob Arch' OR name  =  'Rainbow Bridge'

architecture.question: Which of the mill names contains the french word 'Moulin'?
architecture.query: SELECT name FROM mill WHERE name LIKE '%Moulin%'

architecture.question: What are the distinct name of the mills built by the architects who have also built a bridge longer than 80 meters?
architecture.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.name FROM mill AS T1 JOIN architect AS t2 ON T1.architect_id  =  T2.id JOIN bridge AS T3 ON T3.architect_id  =  T2.id WHERE T3.length_meters  >  80

architecture.question: What is the most common mill type, and how many are there?
architecture.query: SELECT TYPE ,  count(*) FROM mill GROUP BY TYPE ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

architecture.question: How many architects haven't built a mill before year 1850?
architecture.query: SELECT count(*) FROM architect WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT architect_id FROM mill WHERE built_year  <  1850 );

architecture.question: show the name of all bridges that was designed by american archtect, and sort the result by the bridge feet length.
architecture.query: SELECT t1.name FROM bridge AS t1 JOIN architect AS t2 ON t1.architect_id  =  t2.id WHERE t2.nationality  =  'American' ORDER BY t1.length_feet

culture_company.question: How many book clubs are there?
culture_company.query: SELECT count(*) FROM book_club

culture_company.question: Count the number of book clubs.
culture_company.query: SELECT count(*) FROM book_club

culture_company.question: show the titles, and authors or editors for all books made after the year 1989.
culture_company.query: SELECT book_title ,  author_or_editor FROM book_club WHERE YEAR  >  1989

culture_company.question: What are the titles and authors or editors that correspond to books made after 1989?
culture_company.query: SELECT book_title ,  author_or_editor FROM book_club WHERE YEAR  >  1989

culture_company.question: Show all distinct publishers for books.
culture_company.query: SELECT DISTINCT publisher FROM book_club

culture_company.question: What are all the different book publishers?
culture_company.query: SELECT DISTINCT publisher FROM book_club

culture_company.question: Show the years, book titles, and publishers for all books, in descending order by year.
culture_company.query: SELECT YEAR ,  book_title ,  publisher FROM book_club ORDER BY YEAR DESC

culture_company.question: What are the years, titles, and publishers for all books, ordered by year descending?
culture_company.query: SELECT YEAR ,  book_title ,  publisher FROM book_club ORDER BY YEAR DESC

culture_company.question: Show all publishers and the number of books for each publisher.
culture_company.query: SELECT publisher ,  count(*) FROM book_club GROUP BY publisher

culture_company.question: How many books are there for each publisher?
culture_company.query: SELECT publisher ,  count(*) FROM book_club GROUP BY publisher

culture_company.question: What is the publisher with most number of books?
culture_company.query: SELECT publisher FROM book_club GROUP BY publisher ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

culture_company.question: Return the publisher that has published the most books.
culture_company.query: SELECT publisher FROM book_club GROUP BY publisher ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

culture_company.question: Show all book categories and the number of books in each category.
culture_company.query: SELECT category ,  count(*) FROM book_club GROUP BY category

culture_company.question: How many books fall into each category?
culture_company.query: SELECT category ,  count(*) FROM book_club GROUP BY category

culture_company.question: List categories that have at least two books after year 1989.
culture_company.query: SELECT category FROM book_club WHERE YEAR  >  1989 GROUP BY category HAVING count(*)  >=  2

culture_company.question: What categories have two or more corresponding books that were made after 1989?
culture_company.query: SELECT category FROM book_club WHERE YEAR  >  1989 GROUP BY category HAVING count(*)  >=  2

culture_company.question: Show publishers with a book published in 1989 and a book in 1990.
culture_company.query: SELECT publisher FROM book_club WHERE YEAR  =  1989 INTERSECT SELECT publisher FROM book_club WHERE YEAR  =  1990

culture_company.question: What are the publishers who have published a book in both 1989 and 1990?
culture_company.query: SELECT publisher FROM book_club WHERE YEAR  =  1989 INTERSECT SELECT publisher FROM book_club WHERE YEAR  =  1990

culture_company.question: Show all publishers which do not have a book in 1989.
culture_company.query: SELECT publisher FROM book_club EXCEPT SELECT publisher FROM book_club WHERE YEAR  =  1989

culture_company.question: Which publishers did not publish a book in 1989?
culture_company.query: SELECT publisher FROM book_club EXCEPT SELECT publisher FROM book_club WHERE YEAR  =  1989

culture_company.question: Show all movie titles, years, and directors, ordered by budget.
culture_company.query: SELECT title ,  YEAR ,  director FROM movie ORDER BY budget_million

culture_company.question: What are the titles, years, and directors of all movies, ordered by budget in millions?
culture_company.query: SELECT title ,  YEAR ,  director FROM movie ORDER BY budget_million

culture_company.question: How many movie directors are there?
culture_company.query: SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT director) FROM movie

culture_company.question: Count the number of different directors.
culture_company.query: SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT director) FROM movie

culture_company.question: What is the title and director for the movie with highest worldwide gross in the year 2000 or before?
culture_company.query: SELECT title ,  director FROM movie WHERE YEAR  <=  2000 ORDER BY gross_worldwide DESC LIMIT 1

culture_company.question: Return the title and director of the movie released in the year 2000 or earlier that had the highest worldwide gross.
culture_company.query: SELECT title ,  director FROM movie WHERE YEAR  <=  2000 ORDER BY gross_worldwide DESC LIMIT 1

culture_company.question: Show all director names who have a movie in both year 1999 and 2000.
culture_company.query: SELECT director FROM movie WHERE YEAR  =  2000 INTERSECT SELECT director FROM movie WHERE YEAR  =  1999

culture_company.question: Which directors had a movie both in the year 1999 and 2000?
culture_company.query: SELECT director FROM movie WHERE YEAR  =  2000 INTERSECT SELECT director FROM movie WHERE YEAR  =  1999

culture_company.question: Show all director names who have a movie in the year 1999 or 2000.
culture_company.query: SELECT director FROM movie WHERE YEAR  =  1999 OR YEAR  =  2000

culture_company.question: Which directors had a movie in either 1999 or 2000?
culture_company.query: SELECT director FROM movie WHERE YEAR  =  1999 OR YEAR  =  2000

culture_company.question: What is the average, maximum, and minimum budget for all movies before 2000.
culture_company.query: SELECT avg(budget_million) ,  max(budget_million) ,  min(budget_million) FROM movie WHERE YEAR  <  2000

culture_company.question: Return the average, maximum, and minimum budgets in millions for movies made before the year 2000.
culture_company.query: SELECT avg(budget_million) ,  max(budget_million) ,  min(budget_million) FROM movie WHERE YEAR  <  2000

culture_company.question: List all company names with a book published by Alyson.
culture_company.query: SELECT T1.company_name FROM culture_company AS T1 JOIN book_club AS T2 ON T1.book_club_id  =  T2.book_club_id WHERE T2.publisher  =  'Alyson'

culture_company.question: What are all the company names that have a book published by Alyson?
culture_company.query: SELECT T1.company_name FROM culture_company AS T1 JOIN book_club AS T2 ON T1.book_club_id  =  T2.book_club_id WHERE T2.publisher  =  'Alyson'

culture_company.question: Show the movie titles and book titles for all companies in China.
culture_company.query: SELECT T1.title ,  T3.book_title FROM movie AS T1 JOIN culture_company AS T2 ON T1.movie_id  =  T2.movie_id JOIN book_club AS T3 ON T3.book_club_id  =  T2.book_club_id WHERE T2.incorporated_in  =  'China'

culture_company.question: What are the titles of movies and books corresponding to companies incorporated in China?
culture_company.query: SELECT T1.title ,  T3.book_title FROM movie AS T1 JOIN culture_company AS T2 ON T1.movie_id  =  T2.movie_id JOIN book_club AS T3 ON T3.book_club_id  =  T2.book_club_id WHERE T2.incorporated_in  =  'China'

culture_company.question: Show all company names with a movie directed in year 1999.
culture_company.query: SELECT T2.company_name FROM movie AS T1 JOIN culture_company AS T2 ON T1.movie_id  =  T2.movie_id WHERE T1.year  =  1999

culture_company.question: What are all company names that have a corresponding movie directed in the year 1999?
culture_company.query: SELECT T2.company_name FROM movie AS T1 JOIN culture_company AS T2 ON T1.movie_id  =  T2.movie_id WHERE T1.year  =  1999
